Paramètres de synchronisation
À propos
Version

[fr-CA]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.
À propos

[fr-CA]"Special offers, promotions and first hand information about new product releases.
Tailored for you!

Join 140.000 of your peers now!"
[fr-CA]What do we have to offer?
Annuler

[fr-CA]AppInfra is the component\'s top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[fr-CA]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application

[fr-CA]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[fr-CA]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data: Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics

[fr-CA]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales

[fr-CA]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase
[fr-CA]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application

[fr-CA]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization / social media specific credentials

J’autorise Philips à recueillir mes données relatives à l’application, pour favoriser le fonctionnement de l’application, l’améliorer, la personnaliser et l’intégrer aux réseaux sociaux pour montrer des publicités et du contenu pertinents.

Avis sur les cookies

Cette application utilise Adobe Analytics, un service analytique fourni par Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited (« Adobe »). Adobe Analytics utilise des « témoins » ou des techniques similaires, qui sont des fichiers texte placés dans votre application, afin de l’aider à analyser les habitudes générales de suivi. En transmettant à Adobe les renseignements générés par le témoin sur l’utilisation de l’application, le paramètre permet de garantir l’anonymat de l’adresse IP avant la géolocalisation, qui sera remplacée par une adresse IP générique avant le stockage. Au nom de Philips, Adobe se sert de ces renseignements pour évaluer l’utilisation que vous faites de l’application, compiler des rapports sur l’activité de l’application destinés à Philips, et pour fournir à Philips d’autres services liés à l’activité de l’application et à son utilisation. Adobe n’associe pas votre adresse IP à d’autres données qu’elle possède. Vous pouvez empêcher Adobe et Philips de recueillir et d’utiliser des données (témoins et adresse IP) si vous vous désabonnez après avoir fermé cet écran.

AVERTISSEMENT
[fr-CA]Designers, developers and business leaders across Philips.
[fr-CA]Who is it for?
[fr-CA]Reference App comprises all of the configurable common components that are part of the CDP2 Platform.
[fr-CA]What\'s in it?
[fr-CA]It provides all the reference information and tools needed to accelerate and harmonize UX development and ensure appropriate HSDP integration.
[fr-CA]What does it do?
[fr-CA]The UX has been fully approved by Philips Design and will soon be in DLS.
[fr-CA]Fully DLS compliant
[fr-CA]The complete platform is tagged and delivers data to monitor & improve your proposition.
[fr-CA]Analyze to perform
[fr-CA]The Security & Privacy actions of the complete platform are fully in line with Philips rules.
[fr-CA]Secure & personal
[fr-CA]Localization of your proposition is enabled by the platform, including China.
[fr-CA]A global platform
[fr-CA]Functionalities are enabled end-2-end within the Philips landscape.
[fr-CA]Integrated with HSDP & IT

[fr-CA]This app integrates the common components to development new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
[fr-CA]What is Reference App?
